name: Carnage Cuisine
description:
Carnage Cuisine is a survivors-like, action rogue-lite experience where food fights back! Prepare for a culinary revolution as you embark on a thrilling adventure to fight against evil cooks, liberate oppressed foods and become their hero.

🔥 Survivors-like: Dive into survivors-like bullet hell mechanics. Choose the upgrades that suit your play style. Create unique builds. Beat the game by killing the boss.

💎 Meta progression: Collect purple gem things, the strange currency of this gastronomical uprising, and utilize them to upgrade your character and attack skills.



🍌 Go bananas: Take on the role of a courageous warrior, Banana, fighting alongside the rebellious edibles. More playable characters are on the way!

🍽️ Boss battles: Face off against formidable bosses (currently there is only one boss though, more on the way) who serve as the ultimate test of your culinary prowess. Show them who's the true master of the kitchen as you outmaneuver them and deliver the final blow to claim victory.



🛠️ Early access: Join the revolution in the early access phase and witness the game's evolution firsthand. Stay tuned for upcoming updates as we plan to introduce new playable characters, bosses, skills, weapons, game modes, and maps.

Carnage Cuisine is the battle for food liberation that you've been craving. Can you restore freedom to the oppressed edibles? The time has come to unleash your skills and savor the taste of victory!
